a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball IV

p.k: The Nest / The Points / The Bus Elmore residents are going missing, and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. / Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobias's chores, in exchange for "good points"! / When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance.
